title: Title
story1: 9,800 unique mummy candy NFTs. Each candy is wrapped in a bandage of various colors, and each race's face has a rare bandage pattern. One day, Candies are mummified by someone, and the world begins.
description: All mummy candies have rare bandage patterns on their faces. It even applies to each race(7 races below). All faces are made up of 5 different colors and bandage patterns, so each of the 9800 faces has a rare feature.
question1: What chain is Mummy Candy on?
question2: What is the total supply of Mummy Candy Characters?
question3: What are the maximum mints per wallet?
answer3:
- Free Mint: 1 per wallet
- Phase 1 public sale: 3 per wallet
- Phase 2 public sale: 5 per wallet(Including the number of minting during the pre-sale)

Anyone at Freemint can participate in the public sale.
answer4:
- Free Mint: free
- Phase 1 public sale: 0.05 ether
- Phase 2 public sale: 0.1 ether
answer6: Reveal will take place 1 week after Public sale.
question7: How are the 9,800 Mummy Candy distributed?
answer7:
- Free Mint
- Phase 1 public sale
- Phase 2 public sale

Only whitelists are eligible to Freemint.
question8: How can I get a whitelist?
answer8: The whitelist can be obtained via Twitter.
question9: How was the bandage pattern of each race made?
answer9: Each race consists of a long type and a mini type, and the long type is randomly selected from 500 bandage patterns. Similarly, the mini-type is randomly selected from 500 bandage patterns.
answer10: Mummy Candy will receive 6% of all secondary sales.
